section.name: Details
section.p:
Here described some features of Crank Codegen more in detail:
"Root Dir" property points to a root directory of sample application, and because of it, is validated to have proper structure. The validation behavior is fired against the following rules: List <String> criteria = ["/pom.xml", "/src", "/src/main", "/src/main/java", "/src/main/webapp", "/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF", "/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/faces-config.xml"]
Data sources are stored in serialized way in dataSource.xml file by default:
Data sources are loaded during application startup. In "JDBC Settings" tree one may select any of them, edit and update the contents of dataSource.xml from Codegen UI.
The main purpose of having multiple data sources list is to use different data sources to connect to different data stores with, even, different nature.
hsqldb http://hsqldb.org/
MySQL http://www.mysql.com/
Oracle http://www.oracle.com/
